description: An Agent that can call rest endpoints documented via OpenAPI (Swagger).

root_call_url.description: Root URL of the API to call
root_call_url.title: Root Call Url

extra_header_params.description: Extra header parameters to add to every call. This can be a jinja template where the variables in the template are ENV variables (matching case)
extra_header_params.title: Extra Header Params

extra_query_params.description: Extra query parameters to add to every call. This can be a jinja template where the variables in the template are ENV variables (matching case)
extra_query_params.title: Extra Query Params

max_response_size.description: Maximum size of response content to allow. If the response is larger than this, an error will be raised. Default is 50k
max_response_size.title: Max Response Size

title: APIAgent

path.description: Path of the operation. Must match exactly including path parameters
path.title: Path

method.description: HTTP method of the operation.  get and post are supported
method.title: Method

result_filters.description: Filters to apply to the result of the operation per json ref spec
result_filters.title: Result Filters
